QuestData.Title: A Royal Key
QuestData.Description:
I am not about to question whatever twist of fate led you to me. Your timing could not be better.
This cage was custom built to contain me. There is one key, and of course it is on the armor of that large brute over there.
Vanquish him and take the key. Be swift, the Jailer's eyes are always on this area.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The brute that holds the key to free Prince Renathal.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, you are quite resourceful. Give me twenty five of your kind and some proper gear and we could defeat the Master.
